name: Virat Kohli
about: Former Indian captain, one of the greatest batsmen of all time. Dominant force in international cricket. Holds numerous records.

name: Rohit Sharma
about: Indian captain, known for his explosive batting style. Holds the record for the highest individual score in ODIs. Five-time IPL champion.

name: Hardik Pandya
about: All-rounder, known for his aggressive batting and tight bowling. Led Gujarat Titans to IPL victory in 2022. Key player for India.

name: Ravindra Jadeja
about: All-rounder, known for his left-arm spin bowling and lower-order batting. One of the best fielders in the world. Key player for India.

name: Jasprit Bumrah
about: Right-arm fast bowler, known for his unique action and ability to bowl yorkers. One of the best T20 bowlers in the world. Key player for India.
